rooms.description: A spacious living area with central location for natural lighting and easy access to the balcony.
Modern kitchen integrated with dining space. Vastu-compliant placement to enhance positive energy flow.
A comfortable bedroom with an adjoining balcony, ensuring proper ventilation and adherence to Vastu guidelines for the north-east direction.
A functional bathroom located near the bedroom area while maintaining privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance designed for easy access from the driveway, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy.
Spacious balcony attached to bedroom_1 providing fresh air and a view.
